definition: peridium (envelope or coat of fungi, e.g. puffballs)
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: Packet encryption also allows packets to be time-stamped.
sentences.chinese: 包加密也允許包被加上時間標記。

sentences.english: My bag was stolen, and my passport was in it.
sentences.chinese: 我的包被偷了，護照還在裏面呢。

sentences.english: The packages are stored on the distribution server.
sentences.chinese: 包被保存在發佈服務器上。

sentences.english: Registration of custom services normally occurs when its hosting bundle is activated.
sentences.chinese: 通常在定製服務的主包被激活時註冊定製服務。

sentences.english: A whorl of bracts subtending a flower or flower cluster.
sentences.chinese: 包被花或花簇的一輪苞片。

sentences.english: The optimal conjugation ratios of immunogen and coating antigen were 13 and 10.
sentences.chinese: 人工免疫原及包被原的最適結合比爲13和10。

sentences.english: The packages are being stored in the Golden core of your Heart center.
sentences.chinese: 這些包被保存在你的“心靈中心”那“金”核裏。

sentences.english: The primordial meristem at the tip of rhizome is surrounded by 3-5 lepises.
sentences.chinese: 根狀莖頂端的原分生組織由3～5個鱗片包被。

sentences.english: The actions of microtubule organizing centers and coated vesicles were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了包被囊泡和微管組織中心可能的作用。

sentences.english: Real blood vessels have an internal coating of cells that ensure that the blood does not clot.
sentences.chinese: 真血管內部有一層細胞包被，可以確保血液不會凝結。

sentences.english: They are often green and hairy and enclose and protect the flower bud.
sentences.chinese: 常爲綠色多毛的片狀包被，將花蕾保護在其內。

definition: swaddling clothes/fig. early stage of development/infancy
to wrap up/to bind up/bundle/parcel/package/CL:個|个[ge4]
